name: Eat your heart Valentine 2
description:
No job.

No boyfriend.

Rent's going to be due.

Valentines day is on the way.

Let's get you a Job, Date, and try not to die!

Eat your heart Valentine 2 is a short visual novel developed within my spare time over the course of 2022.

The original game was focused on trying to go on a date and not die.
This game does not deviate from that.

Try to get a date, avoid a stalker, try not to get murdered or accidentally murder anybody. If you're interested in this game, please read the content warnings!

If any of the above content warnings bother you, please refrain from playing this game!
